column2: alghu amaddlan n izrfan n ufgan
lligh tga tukza n ullalu n kaygat yan gh tawzha tanafgant d umgiddi n izrfan nnsn tirsal n tdrfit d tzrft d ufra gh umaddal.
tg tamttawt n izrfan n ufgan ad ittawin tugtt n mad ihrshn ar isfafa afrak n ufgan, afad ad yili yan umaddal nna gh ttili dar ufgan tadrfit n wawal d usgd, yanf i asdidi d tammara.
d lligh iga ufrag n izrfann n umdan yan ufggag n yan ungraw n izrfann afad afgan ad ur isti, g tyira, aghwwgh mgal n tdnka d uzzlag; d lligh iqqan ad tdus tmrniwt n tuqqniwin n tiddukla ngr n tmtta,

d lligh illa g tnttamt id igdudn n tmtta imunn nnan digh taflst nnsn g izrfann ifggagn n ufgan, d tizi d watig n wudm anfgan, d umgiddi n izrfann n irgazn d twtmin, rnun nnan is ran ad smghurn alay anamun d tfadiwin ighudan n tudrt g tlla tdrfit imqqurn,
d lligh msushkan iwankn igmamn, s twsin n tmaddast n tmtta imunn, afad ad yili wzrak amaddlan amskar n tdrfiyin d izrfan ifggagn n ufgan,
d lligh iga ufrak s izrfan d tdrfit askkin akswat fadd ad ittug usughn ad,
issafgh d ugraw amatay alghu amaddlan n izrfan n ufgan ad, fad ayg yan uswir nna s ilaq ad nn awddn ak igdudn d tmtta fadd ak middn d ifrdisn n wamun, ikttin

alghu ad, ad dusn, s usslmd d usgmi, sbughlun d uzrak n izrfann d tdrfiyin, afad, s tghtasin izdin tinamurin d timaddlanin, ad ttyakzn gin imskarn imaddlann, ngr n imzdagh n iwankn igmamn ngh ngr ikalln nna illan ddaw n tnaddt nnsn.
amagrad 1
ar d ttlalan middn gan ilellitn mgaddan gh waddur d izrfan, yili ak darsn unlli d ufrak, illa flla sn ad ttmyawasn ngratsn s tagmat.
amagrad 2

ku yan izzddarr ad ittttf kullu izrfan d tdrfiyin lli illan gh ulghu ad, ad ur yili usnuhhyu, zund win uzzurr, ngh aklu, ngh anaw, ngh tutlayt, ngh asgd, ngh tannayt tasrtant ngh tannayt yaddn, ngh mad izzlin s asurs amadan, ngh win ayda ngh win tlalit ngh asurs yaddn. amr asnuhhyu ngr irgazn  timgharin.
ur d iqqan ad yili usnuhhyu ittttfn s waddad asrtan, ngh azrfan ngh amaddlan n tamurt ngh akal gh iddr ufgan, ad tg tmurt ad ngh akal ad adrfi, ngh amsnal ngh warasiman ngh as ittuga kra n uwttu.
amagrad 3
ku yan illa dars uzrf gh tudrt d tdrfit d tnfrut tanimant.
amagrad 4
awd yan ur izddar ad dars ilin ismagn , ula ad izznza ar issagh afgan.
amagrad 5
ur d iqqan ad yili asrfufn n awd yan, ula timskrt ikhshnn lli issmzzzziyn addur n ufgan.
amagrad 6
ku yan illa dars uzrf n tukza n iman ns azrfan gh kaygat adghar.
amagrad 7
mgaddan ak middn mnid n ulugn yili darsn uzrf n uhhttttu n ulugn amr asnuhhyu, ghiklli darsn illa uzrf gh uhhttttu imgaddan mnid n asnuhhyu nna d ur imshushkin d ulghu yad.
amagrad 8
ku yan illa dars uzrf ad iftu s tinfgarin tinamurin igh illa kra uzggal gh izrfan nns lli yas ifka ulugn.
amagrad 9
ittukkas ad ittyimizz ufgan ngh ad ittukraf ngh ad tizzug yan amr alug.
amagrad 10
gaddan ak middn gh uzrf, n adzrin gh umnid n tanfgart tasimant tarawsant, nna ittggan taghtast, izzlin s izrfan nns ngh izushshln nns, ngh tilawt n uynna as ittusbabban g igr n izggaln izrfann.
amagrad 11
urittili ubkkidd khf kra n yan ard ibayn gh mnid n tdabut ilint gis tnfrutin n umzagh.

ur ittili ittyamzz kra n yan khf twuri nghd igh ur iri ad iskr tawuri ghas igh iga mayan ubkkidd g mnid n ulugn anamur nghd agraghlan gh tizi nns, d ur fllas ttili kra n tmmara abla tin tizi ann lligh ittuskar ubkkidd.
amagrad 12
ur ikhssssa ad yili kra ukshshm ikhshshn gh tudrt izzlin s kra n yan nghd tin twzha nns nghd azddugh nns nghd imyawaddn nns ghd addur nns. yili dar ku yan uzrf n uhhttttu n ulugn gh zund akshshum ad.
amagrad 13
ku yan dars tadrfitn usikl d ad isti adghar n uzddugh nns gh iwutta n uwank.
ku yan dars tadrfitn ad iffgh tamurt, tinns ngh tiyyadd, nns yili dars uzrf ad dis yurri.
amagrad 14
ku yan dars azrf ad immuddu s tmazirt yaddn nghd ad dis irwl igh illa ma ikhshshn.
ur ittufka uzrf ad i wanna immuddan afad ad isdabu khf ubkkidd isrtan nghd tighawsiwin lli ur issushkan d iwttasn d imnzayn n tmtta imunn.
amagrad 15
ku yan illa dars uzrf n tnamunt nns.
ur ikhssssa ad ittwakkas uzrf n tnamunt nghd wanna iran a ts isnfl.
amagrad 16
illa uzrf dar urgaz d tmghart, g uzmz d yussan, ad ttihln skrn tawzha nns bla illa kra n usskrf izzlin s tnamunt, ngh anaw nghd asgd. mgaddan awd gh izrfan suln mun ngh g bttttu nnsn
ur ittili littihal ghas igh ira urgaz d tmghart d ur igi fllasn bzziz.
iwl ad iskarn g twzha ad tg tulgint, nntan ad igan tasila n wamun.
amagrad 17
ku yan illa dars uzrf n tilit ad yili i wul nns ngh d wiyyadd.
ur ikhassssa ad ttukas tilit n awd yan.
amagrad 18
ku yan illa dars uzrf n g tdrfit n uswingm d tin tannayt, d tin usgd ghilla illa uzrf ad isnf asgghnns, yilli dars awd uzrf n twnnit tanfrut s kra igat ana nns.
amagrad 19
ku yan illa dars uzrf n tdrfit n tannayt d twnnit, ad ittikssudd khf tannayin nns ula arzzu nns ad yamzz ngh ad izuzzr, abla iwtta, inghmisn d twngimin s ak imassn  usussn.
amagrad 20
ku yan dars tadrfiyin n tsmuni d tin umun, d tin tmsmunin tangrawt
ur izzddarr hhtta yan ad ibzziz f yan ad ikshm s kra n tmsmunt.
amagrad 21
ku yan illa dars azrf afad ad isti d ad ismdya g istayn, ar isdrfi awd s izrfan ighrimn d isrtan.
ku yan illa dars uzrf ad iswuri g tmssugar timattayin n tmazirt.
tirat n ugdud ad igan afggag n tnbaddt tagdudant, tirat ad tkk agharas n ufran izddign nna ittugan ku azmz, s ustay aghzuran imsasan d ustay iffrn ngh abrid t irwasn yikkin tadrfit n ustay
amagrad 22

ku yan illa, ghiklli iga yan ufrdis gh wamun, dars azrf gh unfru anamun :azrf ad ibdda khf hhma ad tili tumrt n izrfan idamsann, inamunn d idlsann izzlin s addur nns d usbughlu n wudm nns, ayad s tdusi tanamurt d twisi tagraghlant, nna isnndn khf usnmala d isugim n ku tamurt.
amagrad 23
ku yan illa dars uzrf n tawuri, d tdrfit n ustay n tawuri nns, g tfadiwin tizrfanin d yussan i twuri n ufrag mgal n tgufi.
ku yan illa dars uzrf n umgiddi gh tghrad n twwuri.
ku yan iswurun dars azrf ad yamzz tighrad nns izrfn d yusan nna as yikkin, ntta d twzha nns, yat tudrt ilan uddur anfgan, nna mmi itturnu, mg illa unngzu, imassn n ufrga anamun.
ku yan illa dars uzrf ad iskr nghd ad yili d inmulla afad ad yili uhhttttu n wayada nns.
amagrad 24
ku yan illa dars uzrf n ussunfu, gh tizi lli ikhwan, d mnshk n tsragin n twuri d ussnfu imun d tghrad.
amagrad 25

ku yan dars azrf n uswir n tudrt as d yusan i tdusi nns, d tumrt nns d tin twzha nns, s usttay tin tmttsha, d ihhruyn d tzdught d idiwan d tnafutin tinamutin ilaqqn, dars azrf n tnafut mg iga amguf ngh amuddin ngh akkushm ngh win tdyalt ngh tusr ngh, g isursn nniddn, tizli n imassn n tudrt ur imun d tirit nns.
ad yili dar tazznt d innas yan ufrag anamun adawsan usddul dd twizi issarn lli isnmala uwank.
amagrad 26

ku yan dars uzrf n usgmi. asgmi ad yili abla aqarridd i usslmd afggag d umzawaru. asslmd amzwaru iga ushshil. asslmad atiqni d uzzulan ad isswu ku yan : adf s tghuriwin timazhzhyalin ad yanf i ku yan, isnnd khf tzmmar.

asgmi ilaq as ad innal abughlu n wudma anafgan d tdusi n uwqqr n izrfannn n ufgan d tdrfiyin tifggagin. ilaq ad ifg taghddft i tiddukla d umshhmal ngr n tmtta d igrawn n tzzurri d usgd d usgm n imussutn n tmtta imunn hhma ad tili tnagrit.
illa uzrf amzwaru dar imawlan ad stin anaw n tghri i tarwa nnsn.
amagrad 27
ku yan illa dars uzrfad yaws gh tudrt n wamun nns tadlsant d tzzurri, yaws awd g usmuttg n tmassanin isfayd gitsnt.
ku yan illa dars uzrf tga tdrfit n usnulfu d tin tzzrrigt d tin usfsr tanfrut g igran n tskla d win tzzurri d win urzzu amassan.
amagrad 28
ku yan illa dars uzrf ad isfayd gh ughawas anamun agraghlan lligh llan izrfan d tdrfiyin lli d yushkan gh alghu ad.
amagrad 29
ku yan ar ittaws gh twizi n wamun s uynna mu izzddarr s tgmi n tudrt nns.
ar nn ittdul ufgan s iskraf lli illan g uslgn gh tizi lligh ay issnfal izrfan d tdrfiyin afad ad giddnt tmassayin tigdudanin d tmskrt g wamun adimuqrratti.
ghiknna ka gant tghawsiwin ur d iqqan ad mmskarn izrfan ad mnid n iwttasn d imnzayn n tmtta imunn.
amagrad 30

ur illi gh ulghu ad kra n uddrriss afad ad ismdya kra n uwank nghd kra n ugdud nghd ufgan s ghiklli ira d ur dars kra n uzrf afad iskr tawri nna ira lli ittrzzzzan izrfan d tdrfyin lli d yiwi gh ulghu ad.
